description: Lengths of months in the Gregorian calendar.
comments: To make the definition unambiguous, consider these as starting from January 2001 (or, equivalently, AD 1 in the proleptic Gregorian calendar). [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 28 2011]
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences related to calendars
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, order 4800.
formula: a(n) = a(n-4800). [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Sep 28 2011]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
